Perceptor:

The blind bot felt the energy bond constrain his arms, he said an old 
Decepticon expresion but he didn't resist, he knew that he was 
prisioner and by now he couldn't do nothing.

"I'm prisioner" said Perceptor"I guess that interrogation it's next"


--- In nbwrpg@y..., robertdahl <rdahl@t...> wrote:
> Wildrider walked in, holding the burnt cassette. Megatron turned 
around.
> "How is our little Interogator?" he asked. "He's been better." 
Wildrider
> said with a hint of amusement. "Is he functional?", "Yeah" Wildrider
> repled. "Excellent." Megatron said, with a serious look on his 
face. He
> grabbed something from a storage compartment in the side 
wall. "Open the
> CR. Ragnus, be ready to fire if need be." Wildrider walked up to 
it, and
> opened the CR, just as it slid open Megatron fired an energy bond at
> Perceptor's body, to constrain his arms.
